text: “Tenzi vedu (Allah)! Uye tumirai pakati pavo mutumwa werudzi rwavo (uye zvirokwazvo Allah vakapindura chikumbiro chavo nekutumira Muhammad (SAW)), uyo achava verengera zviratidzo zvenyu nemitemo iri muGwaro (Qur’aan), uyezve vovadzidzisa Gwaro (Qur’aan) uye Al-Hikmah (Ruzivo rwe mitemo yeIslaam uye huchenjeri neSunnah yamutumwa – nzira yakabvumidzwa), uyezve achavachenura. Zvirokwazvo, ndimi vekumusoro-soro, vane huchenjeri hwese.”
